name: Chrono Froggo
description:
Help a friendly froggo and his room mate to repair their home!

You need to gather different materials, so everything can be fixed until the next storm.

When you found all of the materials, press the up key in front of your house to see the ending!

Controls: 

Keyboard: Arrow Keys, Y/Z Key

Controller: Stick, A Button

This game was made within 72 hours for Mini-Jam 106: Frogs² with the limitation "Limited Time".

Art, Gamedesign, Programming - Michael "Leopold" Langer (https://twitter.com/pinselschubser)

Concept Art - Ann-Kathrin Struck (https://twitter.com/pigeon_dusty)

Music - Jana Höning (https://twitter.com/Quthulhu) 

Cover Illustration - Leon U. Müer (https://www.instagram.com/joppiejaust/)

Playtesting - Pokodo
